document_data.name: Rose Keep
document_data.mainbody: '''Rose Keep''' was a  trade enclave on the edge of [[Veltalar]], in [[Aglarond]].
document_data.Appearance: The enclave was walled with scuffed, mortared stone walls. Inside was a two story building and an attached three story tower with an observatory on top. Iron-reinforced oak gates lead inside. A large red tent is set up in the courtyard to sell items. There is an underground cellar only accessible by magic. {{Cite dragon/366/Rose Keep|46}}
document_data.History:
Rose Keep was founded as a [[Thay]]an [[Thayan enclave|enclave]] early in the [[Era of Upheaval]]. It was the last enclave established before [[Szass Tam]]'s takeover of Thay. Originally overseen by four [[Red Wizards of Thay|Red Wizards]], it teetered on the brink of failure, partly due to two of the Red Wizards leaving to pursue their own interests and [[Levant]] leaving to pledge himself to Szass Tam.  This left Dhenna to run Rose Keep by herself with a newborn daughter. 

She ran it until her death in [[1449 DR]] when her daughter Tharna took over.{{Cite dragon/366/Rose Keep|42}} Tharna continued to run Rose Keep on her own but eventually sought partners in [[1474 DR]] allowing two to buy-in but keeping a majority share for herself.{{Cite dragon/366/Rose Keep|43}}
document_data.Inhabitants:
*[[Dhenna Shavres]] worked there in [[1396 DR]].
*[[Levant]] was one of the four original Red Wizards assigned to oversee Rose Keep.
*[[Tharna Shavres]] became head of Rose Keep in [[1449 DR]] after her mother Dhenna passed away.
*[[Vanargen the Astronomer]] was a partner of Tharna.
*[[Dorim Cragwatcher]] was a partner of Tharna.
